dmca.title: Notice of Infringement of Intellectual Property Rights
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Don Moody [mailto:donm@gengalaw.com] 
Sent: Thursday, September 23, 2004 4:07 PM
To: legal@theplanet.com
Cc: John Genga
Subject: Notice of Infringement of Intellectual Property Rights

 

Attn:  Lance Crosby, Esq. 

 

Dear Mr. Crosby,         

 

Please see the attached notice. Thank you.   

 

 

Don C. Moody, Esq.

of Genga & Associates, P.C.

15821 Ventura Boulevard, Ste. 525

Encino, CA 91436-4779

Ph: 818-444-4524 | Fax: 818-444-4520 | Mobile: 310-795-5216
dmca.principal_name: Genga & Associates, P.C. (for Sharman Networks, Ltd.)
